      • pointTempOverThresholdAlarm

        public static int pointTempOverThresholdAlarm(LibIRTemp.TempThreshold_t temp_threshold,
                                              char cur_temp)
        点测温报警【Point temperature alarm】
        Parameters:
        temp_threshold - Temperature threshold,include upper limit and lower limit
        cur_temp - current temperature
        Returns:
        see LibIRTemp.AlarmTypeResult (greater than upper limit return OVER_HEAT/less than lower limit return OVER_COLD) Point temperature over threshold alarm

      • lineOrRectOverThresholdAlarm

        public static int lineOrRectOverThresholdAlarm(LibIRTemp.TempThreshold_t temp_threshold,
                                               LibIRTemp.TempInfo_t temp_info)
        线/框测温报警【Wire/frame temperature measurement alarm】
        Parameters:
        temp_threshold - Temperature threshold,include upper limit and lower limit
        temp_info - current temperature
        Returns:
        see LibIRTemp.AlarmTypeResult (max or average value greater than upper limit return OVER_HEAT/min or average value less than lower limit return OVER_COLD) Line_t or rectangle temperature over threshold alarm

      • calculateKnAndBn

        public static int calculateKnAndBn(LibIRTemp.VtempInfo_t vtemp_info,
                                   LibIRTemp.KtInfo_t kt_info,
                                   LibIRTemp.CaliPoint_t cali_point,
                                   LibIRTemp.CaliFactor_t cali_factor)
        Parameters:
        vtemp_info - Vtemp Infomation contains Ktemp, Btemp, Address_CA
        kt_info - KT Infomation contains start and end turning address
        cali_point - CaliPoint_t contains high and low environment temperature point of primary calibration
        cali_factor - [out] The normalization coefficient of KT curve contains Kn and Bn
        Returns:

                                           int cur_vtemp,

      • calculateKEAndBE

        public static int calculateKEAndBE(LibIRTemp.EnvParam_t env_param,
                                   LibIRTemp.NucFactor_t nuc_factor,
                                   int gain_flag,
                                   LibIRTemp.EnvFactor_t env_factor)
        计算固件的环境变量校正系数【Calculate the firmware's environmental variable correction factor】
        Parameters:
        env_param - The environment factor correction parameter read from device
        nuc_factor - The NUC map factor read from device
        gain_flag - Gain flag for environment factor validity check
        env_factor - [out] Environment factor correction coefficient contains K_E and B_E
        Returns:
        see LibIRTemp.IrtempResult calculate KE and BE which run in firmware

      • calculateNewKEAndBE

        public static int calculateNewKEAndBE(LibIRTemp.EnvParam_t env_param,
                                      LibIRTemp.NucFactor_t nuc_factor,
                                      int gain_flag,
                                      LibIRTemp.EnvFactor_t env_factor)
        计算新的环境变量校正系数【Calculate the new environmental variable correction factor】

        env_param - The environment factor correction parameter(EMS,TAU,Ta,Tu) read from device
        nuc_factor - The NUC map factor read from device
        gain_flag - Gain flag for for environment factor validity check
        env_factor - [out] Environment factor correction coefficient contains K_E and B_E
        Returns:
        see LibIRTemp.IrtempResult calculate new KE and BE with higher precision

      • calculateTau

        public static char calculateTau(char nuc_dist_high,
                                char nuc_dist_low,
                                char nuc_25_high,
                                char nuc_25_low)
        Parameters:
        nuc_dist_low - NUC value at dist(unit:m) facing the high temperature blackbody
        nuc_dist_low - NUC value at dist(unit:m) facing the low temperature blackbody
        nuc_25_high - NUC value at 0.25m facing the high temperature blackbody
        nuc_25_low - NUC value at 0.25m facing the low temperature blackbody
        Returns:
        NUC value calculate Tau depend on nuc_dist_high,nuc_dist_low,nuc_25_high,nuc_25_low

      • readTau

        public static int readTau(CommonParams.GainStatus gainStatus,
                          byte[] correct_table_H,
                          byte[] correct_table_L,
                          float hum,
                          float t_env,
                          float dist,
                          int[] tau)
        读取等效大气透过率【Read the equivalent atmospheric transmittance】
        Parameters:
        gainStatus -
        correct_table_H - file name that store tau at different humidity,environment temperature and object distance
        correct_table_L - file name that store tau at different humidity,environment temperature and object distance
        hum - humidity(0-1)
        t_env - environment temperature (units:Celsius)
        dist - object distance (0.25-49.99) (unit: m)
        tau - length:1
        [out] tau after double linear interpolation
        Returns:
        see LibIRTemp.IrtempResult

      • writeTau

        public static int writeTau(byte[] correct_table,
                           float hum,
                           float t_env,
                           float dist,
                           int tau)
        写入等效大气透过率【Write equivalent atmospheric transmittance】
        Parameters:
        correct_table - file name that store tau at different humidity,environment temperature and distance
        hum - humidity(0-1)
        t_env - environment temperature (units:Celsius)
        dist - object distance (0.25-49.99) (unit: m)
        tau - tau that will be written(0-16384)
        Returns:
        see LibIRTemp.IrtempResult

      • calculateNucWithNucFactor

      • readTauWithTargetTempAndDist

        public static int readTauWithTargetTempAndDist(CommonParams.GainStatus gainStatus,
                                               byte[] correct_table_H,
                                               byte[] correct_table_L,
                                               float temp,
                                               float distance,
                                               int[] tau)
        read tau from correct table
        Parameters:
        gainStatus -
        correct_table_H - table that store tau at different target distance and target temperature
        correct_table_L - table that store tau at different target distance and target temperature
        temp - target temperature (unit: Celcius)
        -20~150 in high gain
        0~550 in low gain
        distance - target distance (0.25-49.99) (unit: m)
        tau - tau after double linear interpolation
        Returns:

      • tempCorrect

        public static int tempCorrect(float ems,
                              int tau,
                              float ta,
                              float org_temp,
                              float[] new_temp)
        temperature correction with new method
        Parameters:
        ems - Target emissivity(0-1)
        tau - Atmospheric transmittance(0-16384)
        ta - Atmospheric temperature(unit: Celcius)
        -20~70
        org_temp - origin temperature before correction(unit: Celcius)
        -20~150 in high gain
        0~550 in low gain
        new_temp - new temperature after correction(unit: Celcius)
        Returns:

      • reverseTempCorrect

        public static int reverseTempCorrect(CommonParams.GainStatus gainStatus,
                                     float ems,
                                     int tau,
                                     float ta,
                                     float new_temp,
                                     float[] org_temp)

        Parameters:
        gainStatus -
        ems - Target emissivity(0-1)
        tau - Atmospheric transmittance(0-16384)
        ta - Atmospheric temperature(unit: Celcius) -43~157 in high gain
        -43~600 in low gain
        new_temp - new temperature after correction(unit: Celcius)
        org_temp - origin temperature before correction(unit: Celcius)
